title: Night of the Demons 2
descriptions:
Night of the Demons 2 (1994) follows a new group of teens who unwittingly reignite the evil of Hull House, the infamous abandoned mansion where a Halloween party turned into a massacre years earlier. Angela, the demon-possessed hostess of that original night, has since become a legend whispered about at St. Rita’s Academy, a nearby Catholic boarding school. Among the students is Angela’s younger sister, Melissa—nicknamed “Mouse”—a timid girl haunted by her family’s tragedy and bullied by classmates who treat the Hull House tale as a spooky thrill rather than a warning.

When a clique of rebellious students—led by the snarky Shirley and accompanied by the tough-but-kind Bibi, her boyfriend Rick, their friends Johnny and Kurt, and Mouse—decide to crash Hull House for a Halloween prank, they bring along a lipstick-stolen invitation to evil. Despite the school’s stern headmaster and the watchful, martial arts–savvy Sister Gloria, the kids slip out to the ruined mansion, whose rotten rooms and demonic mirrors are still stained by the previous massacre. Inside, a séance and taunts aimed at coaxing Mouse to face her fears inadvertently crack open a gateway to the demonic realm. Angela manifests, seductive and monstrous, her power greater than a mere ghost’s—Hull House is her lair, and Halloween night her hunting ground.

What begins as a dare quickly becomes a blood-soaked nightmare. One by one, the teens encounter grotesque manifestations: possessed lipstick with a mind of its own, shape-shifting shadows, and Angela’s cruel games that twist desire into doom. They narrowly escape, but not before Angela marks them—and more importantly, before she transfers a small vial of demonic blood out of the house, hitching a ride back to St. Rita’s with the fleeing students. This breach breaks the rule that evil cannot cross the property line, allowing Angela’s influence to seep into the safer, holier world of the school.

Back at St. Rita’s, the demonic outbreak escalates. Classmates become possessed, hallways warp, and the school dance devolves into chaos as Angela hunts Mouse, hoping to recruit her sister into the demonic fold and complete a horrific family reunion. Sister Gloria, armed with faith, a no-nonsense attitude, and an assortment of improvised holy weapons, joins forces with the surviving teens. The battle swings between slapstick horror and genuine danger, with crucifix-laced water guns, rosary whips, and a fiery determination to send Angela back.

Mouse, moving from traumatized outcast to unlikely anchor of strength, becomes central to the climax. Angela lures her back toward Hull House for a final confrontation where family guilt and demonic manipulation collide. The heroes exploit the crucial boundary-law of the demons, using consecrated items and clever tactics to drive Angela into a position where her power wanes outside her domain. In a blend of camp and carnage, they force a showdown that leaves Hull House smoldering and Angela banished—at least for now.

Night of the Demons 2 balances gory effects, sardonic humor, and Catholic-school mayhem, expanding the original’s mythology while delivering a Halloween romp where friendship, faith, and a fearless nun try to hold the line against a queen of hell determined to make every night a demon’s night.
